channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @Noahpinion Counterpoint: It coincided with, and partly resulted from, the improvements to life brought by social media.
item.source:markdown: @Noahpinion Counterpoint: It coincided with, and partly resulted from, the improvements to life brought by social media.

item.description: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber I think this all moot, since I expect that one result of the Yeshiva decision will be that secular governments can have no say on religious schools — even as state governments will have to fund them.
item.source:markdown: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber I think this all moot, since I expect that one result of the Yeshiva decision will be that secular governments can have no say on religious schools — even as state governments will have to fund them.

item.description: @EladNehorai Isn’t this just Levinas?
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai Isn’t this just Levinas?

item.description: @trekonomics “They’re on our side, I believe.”
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics “They’re on our side, I believe.”

item.description: @EladNehorai Here’s a man listening to a fascist, and I can’t recommend it highly enough. https://t.co/LLZ84T83FK
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai Here’s a man listening to a fascist, and I can’t recommend it highly enough. https://t.co/LLZ84T83FK

item.description: @emptywheel @AkivaMCohen Agreed. “Capabilities” not “devices.” And the date.
item.source:markdown: @emptywheel @AkivaMCohen Agreed. “Capabilities” not “devices.” And the date.

item.description:
Hmmmm. What foreign government has interesting nuclear capabilities? https://t.co/JZxYNrS2jG

As I believe @emptywheel has noted, a Top Secret folder photographed by the FBI at Mar-a-lago was dated the date of Trump’s withdrawal from the Iran nuclear deal.
item.source:markdown:
Hmmmm. What foreign government has interesting nuclear capabilities? https://t.co/JZxYNrS2jG
As I believe @emptywheel has noted, a Top Secret folder photographed by the FBI at Mar-a-lago was dated the date of Trump’s withdrawal from the Iran nuclear deal.

item.description: @mjbxsd @lylden @rickhasen Remeber that Alito has said he was radicalized by the Warren Court’s imposition of the one man one vote doctrine.
item.source:markdown: @mjbxsd @lylden @rickhasen Remeber that Alito has said he was radicalized by the Warren Court’s imposition of the one man one vote doctrine.

item.description: “This is a fitting coda to the end of Chief of Staff Aviv Kochavi’s term. Under him, the IDF adopted a policy of lying to the media. Its relations with the press became so warped that it engaged in what appears to have been actual fraud during Operation Guardian of the Walls.” https://t.co/LAB3XYY7re
item.source:markdown: “This is a fitting coda to the end of Chief of Staff Aviv Kochavi’s term. Under him, the IDF adopted a policy of lying to the media. Its relations with the press became so warped that it engaged in what appears to have been actual fraud during Operation Guardian of the Walls.” https://t.co/LAB3XYY7re

item.description: @swordsjew F Scott Fitzgerald would not appreciate this alcohol erasure.
item.source:markdown: @swordsjew F Scott Fitzgerald would not appreciate this alcohol erasure.

item.description: @trekonomics @hyperplanes @neilhimself He says he doesn't "much," which seems accurate, unless you want to stretch "about" into the metaphorical.
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics @hyperplanes @neilhimself He says he doesn't "much," which seems accurate, unless you want to stretch "about" into the metaphorical.

item.description: "His born-again-Christian stance proved to be the most damaging conversion since the Jewish cabalistic messiah Sabbatai Zevi bowed to the blade and embraced Islam in 1666." --James Wolcott on Dylan in 1985 https://t.co/23rOPT323P
item.source:markdown: "His born-again-Christian stance proved to be the most damaging conversion since the Jewish cabalistic messiah Sabbatai Zevi bowed to the blade and embraced Islam in 1666." --James Wolcott on Dylan in 1985 https://t.co/23rOPT323P

item.description: @delong @DouthatNYT Rule of (secular) law is not a religious value for Douthat and his ilk, so of course he’ll (reluctantly) follow a fascist who mouths the holy words.
item.source:markdown: @delong @DouthatNYT Rule of (secular) law is not a religious value for Douthat and his ilk, so of course he’ll (reluctantly) follow a fascist who mouths the holy words.

item.description: @JYuter @DBashIdeas Pshita. So obviously RDB meant “miner” holiday, which Labor Day of course is.
item.source:markdown: @JYuter @DBashIdeas Pshita. So obviously RDB meant “miner” holiday, which Labor Day of course is.

item.description:
@ShulimLeifer Find me one right wing Israeli politician who denounced the racism with which Obama was greeted by the American Orthodox community.

@ShulimLeifer Receipts for the above claim, from November 2008. https://t.co/Vrd8dGmWmr
item.source:markdown:
@ShulimLeifer Find me one right wing Israeli politician who denounced the racism with which Obama was greeted by the American Orthodox community.

item.description:
@lavietidhar So John Scalzi. Excellent.

@lavietidhar Or did you mean Theodor Herzl, whose column “The View from Venus” was not, apparently, about speculative fiction.
item.source:markdown:
@lavietidhar So John Scalzi. Excellent.
@lavietidhar Or did you mean Theodor Herzl, whose column “The View from Venus” was not, apparently, about speculative fiction.

item.description: @JewWhoHasItAll @TheTonightSho His story about the Tower of Babel was explicitly written to rebut a midrash quoted by Rashi.
item.source:markdown: @JewWhoHasItAll @TheTonightSho His story about the Tower of Babel was explicitly written to rebut a midrash quoted by Rashi.

item.description: @AkivaMCohen Imagine misquoting a Galaxy Quest motto in public for no good reason!
item.source:markdown: @AkivaMCohen Imagine misquoting a Galaxy Quest motto in public for no good reason!

item.description: @historianess Lacking any context to this, I’m envisioning something sexual with epicycles, and oy does that prospect make me feel old.
item.source:markdown: @historianess Lacking any context to this, I’m envisioning something sexual with epicycles, and oy does that prospect make me feel old.

item.description:
@wordpaley Bruce Cockburn: “I learned as a child not to trust in my body I've carried that burden through my life But there's a day when we all have to be pried loose” https://t.co/WyP6fUFyd7

@wordpaley And just today I noticed this Leonard Cohen lyric: “He said, I locked you in this body I meant it as a kind of trial You can use it for a weapon Or to make some woman smile...” https://t.co/JQzISzk1Np
item.source:markdown:
@wordpaley Bruce Cockburn: “I learned as a child not to trust in my body I've carried that burden through my life But there's a day when we all have to be pried loose” https://t.co/WyP6fUFyd7
